alert.note: Alert for Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 25 at 8:20AM ChST until May 25 at 2:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mph, gradually decreasing through the day. * WHERE...Tinian and Saipan * WHEN...Until 2 PM ChSt this afternoon * IMPACTS...Strong to near-gale winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Tarps and canopies could be blown over. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mawar is west of the Marianas. Conditions will continue to improve through the day. Debris already produced by tropical storm force winds may still be moved by the winds.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
